channel.title: 3 Questions about nyx
channel.description:
Is there a way to see which circuits were used for which websites?
Why do some circuits have a different number of middle relays? I see some with 1 and some with 2 while there are some with 3?
An finally, is there a way to differentiate if a circuit was used for a clearnet or an onion website (since onion sites have 6 hops, right?)?
